\f0\b\fs38 \cf0 EncFS Plugin for Macfusion 2 \b0\fs26 \ \ Copyright (c) 2009, Tobias Haeberle\ All Rights Reserved.\ Published under BSD License.\ \ http://thenakedman.wordpress.com/encfs/\ \
\b Features \b0 \ \ - Mount and unmount Encrypted Filesystems (EncFS)\ - Create new Encrypted Filesystems\ \ For more information regarding EncFS visit:\ http://www.arg0.net/encfs\ \
\b Requirements\ \
\b0 You will need to have EncFS 1.7.4 or newer installed on your system. EncFS must be installed in /usr/local/bin. The recommended way to install EncFS is using homebrew: http://mxcl.github.com/homebrew/\ \ $ brew install encfs\ \
\b Support \b0 \ \ If you need assistance you are welcome to contact me via E-Mail: tobias.haeberle@gmail.com}
